column4: Latest;Phnom Penh: A 16-year-old a construction worker
column5: slipped from the 20th floor of a condominium building and died. The incident occurred shortly after 9:15 am on Thursday
column17: Kampong Thom province.------Three witnesses; Viv Srey Pov
column22: told police that the victim and other workers had on the 19th floor. The victim and Khin Ith went to the elevator to take concrete from the 20th floor. The victim slipped down an elevator shaft and landed at the base of the building.------After the incident
column23: a forensic expert arrived at the scene and confirmed that the victim had died from a fall. ------POST NEWS
